title: Carol's Daughter 8 oz. Healthy Hair Butter
description:
Carols Daughter Healthy Hair Butter 8 Fl.Oz. With the power of seven essential oils, this creamy hair dress conditions your hair and scalp, helping to minimize breakage. Essential oils of sweet orange, lemongrass, patchouli, ylang-ylang, lavender, cedarwood, shea butter and rosemary make this a can't-miss item for the whole family. Lavender and sweet orange are powerhouses that rejuvenate. Cedarwood helps relieves an itchy scalp. Ylang-ylang, a rumored aphrodisiac that regulates oil production. 
Lemongrass and rosemary stimulates scalp circulation. Patchouli rejuvenates cells with anti-inflammatory, anti-fungal properties. WOODEN TRAY & LAVENDER NOT INCLUDED.

title: TRESemme Naturals Nourishing Moisture Conditioner, Aloe Vera and Avocado, 25 Ounce
DevaCurl No-Poo Zero Lather Conditioning Cleanser 12.0 oz
description: Buy DevaConcepts Hair Conditioners - DevaCurl No-Poo Zero Lather Conditioning Cleanser 12.0 oz. How-to-Use: Wet hair thoroughly. Apply a generous amount directly tot he scalp to cleanse, stimulate and remove dirt particles.
